summary: Marine atomic tests cause changes in the ocean's ecosystem resulting in dangerous blobs of radiation and the resurrection of a dormant dinosaur that threatens London.
cast: Gene Evans|André Morell|Leigh Madison|John Turner|Jack MacGowran|Maurice Kaufmann|Henri Vidon|John Adams|Joyce Adams|Chris Adcock|Neal Arden|Jack Armstrong|Paul Beradi|Ernest Blyth|Wallace Bosco|Janet Bradbury|Anna Cameron|Bill Cummings|Max Faulkner|Chick Fowles|Arthur Gomez|Neil Hallett|Aidan Harrington|George Holdcroft|Alastair Hunter|Ann Jay|Patrick Jordan|Lloyd Lamble|Howard Lang|Dickey Luck|Fred Machon|Jack Mandeville|André Maranne|John More|Lola Morice|Michael Mulcaster|Derren Nesbitt|Charles Price|Ernie Rice|Pat Ryan|Leonard Sachs|Ian Selby|Peter Sinclair|Guy Standeven|Philip Stewart|Jim Tyson|Joe Wadham|Georgina Ward|John Wilder
keywords: radiation|animal character name as title|psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|monster
director: Directors: Douglas Hickox, Eugène Lourié (as Eugene Lourie)
title: El monstruo submarino
